meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>leader</radical> is using a <radical>stick</radical> in the <radical>winter</radical> made of <radical>hair</radical>. This is the stick of <kanji>mastering</kanji> and <kanji>repair</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: What's the key to <kanji>mastering</kanji> any skill? A stick and a <reading>shoe</reading> (しゅう)!
